author: RTÉ News
title: What are the 'essential retail outlets' staying open?
description: What does the Government define as "essential retail outlets"?
content:
The Taoiseach has asked people to stay at home and only venture outside when absolutely necessary.
The call came as the Government announced what it called "unprecedented actions" to curb the spread of the Covid-19 virus and avoid hospitals being overwhelmed… [+2866 chars]
